email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a potential opportunity for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The cargo size is approximately 80,000 MT. I’m quoting a starting freight rate of $52.50 per MT. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for reaching out. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider something in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you provide vessel details and laycan? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.00 per MT, which is competitive given the current market. The vessel I have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, a 85,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 230 meters. The laycan is 15th-20th October. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15th-20th October? Also, what are the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15th-20th October. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, payable in USD. If everything looks good, I can draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s finalize at $51.00 per MT with the agreed laycan and demurrage terms. Thanks for your help. Best, John
